info.title: Wikipedia
info.description: This API aims to provide straightforward and low-latency access to Wikimedia content and services. It is currently in beta testing, so things aren't completely locked down yet. Each entry point has explicit stability markers to inform you about development status and change policy, according to our API version policy.

get.summary: List page properties / page content sub-apis.nStability: [unstable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Stable)n
get.description: List page properties / page content sub-apis.nStability: [unstable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Stable)n

get.summary: List titles for which the data-parsoid property is available. This currently only lists pages which have revisions stored in RESTBase.nStability: [unstable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Unstable)n
get.description: List titles for which the data-parsoid property is available. This currently only lists pages which have revisions stored in RESTBase.nStability: [unstable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Unstable)n

get.summary: Retrieve the latest data-parsoid (private Parsoid metadata)nStability: [unstable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Unstable)n
get.description: Retrieve the latest data-parsoid (private Parsoid metadata)nStability: [unstable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Unstable)n

get.summary: List data-parsoid revisions for a page. This currently only lists revisions stored in RESTBase.nStability: [unstable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Unstable)n
get.description: List data-parsoid revisions for a page. This currently only lists revisions stored in RESTBase.nStability: [unstable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Unstable)n

get.summary: Retrieve data-parsoid (internal Parsoid metadata) for a given page & revisionnStability: [unstable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Unstable)n
get.description: Retrieve data-parsoid (internal Parsoid metadata) for a given page & revisionnStability: [unstable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Unstable)n

get.summary: List titles for which an HTML representation is available. Currently this only lists pages that have revisions stored in RESTBase.nStability: [experimental](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Experimental)n
get.description: List titles for which an HTML representation is available. Currently this only lists pages that have revisions stored in RESTBase.nStability: [experimental](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Experimental)n

get.summary: Retrieve the latest html for a page title. nIf you know the revision as well, then please use the `{title}/{revision}` end point instead for better performance.nSee [the MediaWiki DOM spec](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Parsoid/MediaWiki_DOM_spec) f
get.description: Retrieve the latest html for a page title. nIf you know the revision as well, then please use the `{title}/{revision}` end point instead for better performance.nSee [the MediaWiki DOM spec](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Parsoid/MediaWiki_DOM_spec) for a description of the MediaWiki-specific semantic markup in this HTML.nStability: [unstable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Unstable)n

get.summary: List HTML revisions for a title. This currently only lists revisions that are already stored in RESTBase.nStability: [experimental](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Experimental)n
get.description: List HTML revisions for a title. This currently only lists revisions that are already stored in RESTBase.nStability: [experimental](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Experimental)n

get.summary: Retrieve the html for a given revision (and optional timeuuid).nSee [the MediaWiki DOM spec](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Parsoid/MediaWiki_DOM_spec) for a description of the MediaWiki-specific semantic markup in this HTML.nThis HTML can be edited
get.description: Retrieve the html for a given revision (and optional timeuuid).nSee [the MediaWiki DOM spec](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Parsoid/MediaWiki_DOM_spec) for a description of the MediaWiki-specific semantic markup in this HTML.nThis HTML can be edited using arbitrary HTML tools. The modified HTML can be converted back to wikitext using the [/transform/html/to/wikitext{/title}{/revision}](#!/Transforms/transform_html_to_wikitext__title___revision__post) entry point.nStability: [unstable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Unstable)n

get.summary: List revisions. This currently only lists revisions stored in RESTBase.nStability: [experimental](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Experimental). Don't rely on this.n
get.description: List revisions. This currently only lists revisions stored in RESTBase.nStability: [experimental](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Experimental). Don't rely on this.n

get.summary: Get metadata about a specific revision.nStability: [unstable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Unstable)n
get.description: Get metadata about a specific revision.nStability: [unstable](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Unstable)n

get.summary: List all pages.nStability: [experimental](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Experimental). Don't rely on this.n
get.description: List all pages.nStability: [experimental](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Experimental). Don't rely on this.n

get.summary: List revisions for a title. Currently this lists all revisions that ever used this title and are stored in RESTBase, but eventually it should probably return the linear history (across renames) of the page currently using this title.nStability: [expe
get.description: List revisions for a title. Currently this lists all revisions that ever used this title and are stored in RESTBase, but eventually it should probably return the linear history (across renames) of the page currently using this title.nStability: [experimental](https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API_versioning#Experimental)n

parameters.name: wikitext
parameters.description: The Wikitext to transform to HTML
